name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a Senior Python Full Stack Developer with 8+ years of experience, I possess a strong expertise in **Azure Cloud**, **Azure DevOps**, **Terraform**, and **PowerShell**, enabling me to design and implement high-performance solutions specifically tailored for cloud environments. I have a proven track record in CI/CD processes and proficiency in **Azure Services** that enhance system reliability and security. My technical skills encompass **Python** and frameworks such as **FastAPI, Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy**, complemented by frontend technologies including **Angular, Vue, React**, and **Next.js**. I am experienced in utilizing **Azure Monitor**, **Application Insights**, **Microsoft Sentinel**, and **Microsoft Defender** to ensure robust security and monitoring practices. My background also includes expertise in **database optimization** with **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **MongoDB**, as well as a thorough understanding of **Security Best Practices** and **Network Setup**. I am committed to delivering enterprise-grade solutions aligned with industry standards and best practices in cloud computing.
